title: Cosmic Quest
description: Text-based Scifi Video game using restful API. Featuring background audio and text-to-speech audio.

title: Shelfie
description: An application that allows the user to search for books they have read, or wish to read in the future and add to a collection. Accessibility features included.

title: Logo Maker
description: A command-line application that takes in user input to generate a logo and save it as an SVG file. Walkthrough video linked to demonstrate its functionality.

title: Personal Blog
description: Two-page website where users can input and veiw blog posts. Featuring a light/dark toggle mode.

title: Task Board
description: An application that allows users to manage, drag and delete tasks. Featuring status color changing.

title: Employee Tracker
description: A command-line application to manage a company's employee database. Walkthrough video linked to demonstrate its functionality.
